general_info.summary: This document outlines various guidelines and programs, including those for visas and FRO/FRRO, medical insurance, and observership programs. It also highlights "Paramarsh," a mentoring portal, the option to chat with a student ambassador, information for recruiters, and COVID-19 updates.
